name: Imposter
description: A game of deception. Find the imposter who doesn't know the secret word.

phases.title: Secret Word
phases.instruction: Memorize your word. If you are the Imposter, try to blend in!

phases.title: Discussion
phases.instruction: Take turns saying a word related to the secret word. Vote when ready.

phases.title: Who is the Imposter?
phases.instruction: Vote for the player you suspect.
